name: Intellectsoft
overview:
Intellectsoft LTD is an international privately owned company, founded in 2007, with offices in London, Berlin and San Jose, California. It specialises in development services for the major mobile platforms: iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Windows Phone 7, Symbian / Maemo / Meego. Headquartered in the United Kingdom, Company considers Europe, UK and USA to be its key markets. The Company’s primary goal is to provide high-quality services to meet client’s expectations. It has 4-year experience and rich technology competencies under the belt. Intellectsoft services and areas of expertise include:

  1. mobile applications development (iPhone/iPad, Android, Blackberry, Symbian, Windows Phone 7, iOS, Symbian / Maemo / Meego)

  2. web development

  3. business analysis, software requirements investigation

  4. architecture and design of software applications

  5. support and maintenance of software applications

  6. customisation/localisation services

  7. software testing and quality assurance

Intellectsoft developers have delivered 100+ successful projects to over 70 customers from all over the world. Its solid team is proud to have the world’s most famous companies among the satisfied clients: WIPRO Technologies, Diageo (Guinness), Blue Systems, The Chartered Institute of Marketing (CIM), Holiday Inn, CLINIQUE, Oxford University Press and many others. Browse through the platforms, solution types and industries on http://www.intellectsoft.co.uk to gain the full perspective of Company’s experience and don’t hesitate to contact Intellectsoft at sales@intellectsoft.co.uk for more information.

Get a quick free quote at http://www.intellectsoft.co.uk/getaquote.html. Check Intellectsoft on http://www.facebook.com/Intellectsoftpage - there are loads of interesting pics, news and useful links there. Want to follow Intellectsoft? They will be delighted http://twitter.com/#!/Intellectsoft
